name: Furious Sword
description:
Furious Sword - This tells the story of a mysterious vagabond who fights the forces of evil for good. He will have to go through many trials on his way and who knows how it will end. Explore a huge world, fight gloomy monsters and help the locals and their problems.

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Travel across a huge world, meet friendly characters and complete their tasks. Pump up your level and unlock new abilities to fight evil!
